sense.name: coat with a glaze
sense.examples: The potter glazed the dishes. Julia glazed the test cup with sample colors. Krispy Kreme glazes their doughnuts right in front of the customers. I will glaze the pound cake once it cools. Marty glazed the cupcakes with potter's glaze by mistake.

sense.name: become glassy
sense.examples: The student's eyes glazed over during the extremely boring lecture. People glaze over when they feel overwhelmed. He is completely glazed over from lack of interest. Ira's eyes glazed over after the first half hour of knitting club. Children glaze over when dragged to adult functions.
